decision_conditions: Details of hard and soft landscaping
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details submitted to comply with the requirements of the following conditions relating to planning permission 20/01611/FULL1 (allowed at appeal APP/G5180/W/20/3257236):Condition 2 - Details for site set up during construction including provision for the temporary parking of contractors vehicles and the loading and unloading of vehicles.Condition 4 - Details of hard and soft landscaping. Condition 5 - Details of surface water drainage.Condition 6 - Details of measures to minimise the risk of crime. Condition 7 - Details of screen to protect the development from railway noise. Condition 8 - Details of fenestration to provide sound insulation from external noise and vibration from railway line.Condition 9 - Details of existing access stopping up at back edge of highway. Condition 10 - Details of cycle parking.Condition 11 - Details of storage of refuse and recyclable materials.
